thread.title: Report: Women woefully underrepresented in Kuwait’s political process (Rice University)
thread.title_full: Report: Women woefully underrepresented in Kuwait’s political process (Rice University) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Report: Women woefully underrepresented in Kuwait’s political process (Rice University)
text: ( Source : Rice University ) Despite being granted full political rights more than a decade ago, Kuwaiti women involved in the country's political process have encountered many challenges, both inside and outside the parliament chamber,
